summary: Pomodoro/task streak web app: update streak based on real IST date (not page refresh), ensure data/tasks persist across app versions, and update footer branding text.
architectural_notes: Streak/day calculations must use IST timezone (Asia/Kolkata) and advance only when IST calendar date changes.
Persist all user data across deployments by keeping localStorage key schema stable (or providing migration).
known_issues: Streak currently increments on refresh/reload/open instead of on real IST date change.
New deployments currently appear to start blank instead of loading existing localStorage data.

existing_features.title: Update the engagement streak logic so the streak increments only when the real calendar date changes in IST (Asia/Kolkata), not when the page is refreshed/reloaded/opened multiple times within the same IST day.

Ensure the app always loads existing tasks/days/streak data from the previous deployed version(s) by keeping localStorage persistence fully backward-compatible, including reading any previously-used storage keys and migrating them into the current key without data loss.
Replace the sidebar/footer credit text "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" with exactly: "Developed product by Aditya Verma" (plain text, no link).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update streak logic to increment only when the real IST date changes (not on refresh/reload).
Ensure newest deployment reads and preserves existing user data (tasks/days/streak) from previous versions via stable localStorage keys / migration as needed.
Replace footer text 'Built with love using Caffiene' with 'Developed product by Aditya Verma'.
